text: What is the difference between `IterTools.firstrest`  and `Iterators.peel`?

It would not be surprising if they were the same.
Overtime more and more things end up in Base.Iterators.
It is getting to the point we might want to just move everything.

text: Perhaps IterTools should in the Standard library reexporting Base.Iterators, so `using Iterators` does what one expect it to do (not commenting on the technical feasibility, only what feels right here to me).

text: It would be even less surprising to me if it seemed like they were the same but were actually subtly different

text: `Iterators.peel` also wasn't documented at the time it was added to IterTools. <https://github.com/JuliaCollections/IterTools.jl/pull/66>
